A4.text: Joseph Patrick Kennedy Jr. was the eldest of the nine children born to Joseph P. Kennedy Sr. and Rose Fitzgerald Kennedy.

A5.text: The foundation was led by his youngest brother, U.S. Senator Edward Kennedy, until his death in August 2009.

A6.text: JFK Letter on the Death of Brother Joe Kennedy Jr.
